MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Cairneyhill. We are aware of previous power cuts in your area and we apologise for this. Our next available engineer will re-attend site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:35pm on Thursday, 31 December 2020
